content: 10 cast on 3 sts cast off 3 sts k1 kfb 2 stretchy edge cast on 12 using using 3 25mm times k2 sl1 wyif 9 sts single pointed needles and pale cream yarn start row 11 to 18 repeat row 7 to 10 twice more 9 sts at the outer edge row 19 cast off 2 sts knit to last stitch sl1 wyif row 1 ws p2tog 6 times 6 sts 7 sts pull through to cast off row 20 to 21 repeat row 19 twice more 3 sts row 22 k2tog sl1 wyif 2 sts making up for the body sew the side edges decrease cast off all sts this seam runs down centre back stuff and sew the cast on edge decrease along the top for each eye sew the first and last cast on sts decrease to make a circle making up weave in cast on/off tails on ws shape and sew the 2 eyes onto the front of the owl using a running back stitch around the outer edge in pale cream yarn sew on a 6mm button for the owl owl s pupil on each eye in mouse grey yarn knot a length of yarn on each top corner and trim the tails to 1cm long for the tufty ears in dark yellow yarn owl body embroider the beak in vertical stitches between the make 1 per owl cast on eyes layer up on top of each other to make the 26 sts using 3 25mm single rounded beak using darkest grey yarn and swiss pointed needles and mouse grey darning aka duplicate stitch embroider flecks on yarn start at the top edge the owl s tummy below the eyes sew the cast on row 1 to 20 starting on a rs knit row work 20 edge of each wing onto the side of the body row in st st weave in any rem yarn tails row 21 k1 k2tog k4 4 times k1 22 sts row 22 purl poinsettia row 23 k1 k2tog k3 4 times k1 18 sts row 24 purl poinsettia flower petals row 25 k2tog 9 times 9 sts make 2 per flower * cast on 2 sts using 3 25mm pull through to cast off single pointed needles and dark red yarn autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 13 of 19 row 1 rs kfb sl1 wyif 3 sts row 3 rs k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts row 2 kfb knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 4 sts break the working yarn and join bobbins of chocolate brown 2 bobbins and red 1 bobbin row 3 to 4 repeat row 2 two more times 6 sts for intarsia colour-work row 5 to 8 k5 sl1 wyif row 4 p6 chocolate brown p6 red p6 chocolate row 9 k2tog knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 5 sts brown row 10 repeat row 9 4 sts row 5 k5 chocolate brown k8 red k5 chocolate break
